items.name: Huntington Beach Pier
items.address: 21601 Pacific Coast Hwy, Huntington Beach, CA 92646
items.description: Most people will walk along the pier and go through several of the shops.

items.name: Orange County Coast
items.address: 25300 Dana Point Harbor Dr, Dana Point, CA 92629
items.description: This is where most people will go to enjoy the beach and watch the sunset.

items.name: Huntington State Beach
items.address: 21601 Pacific Coast Highway, Huntington Beach, CA 92646
items.description: Here many people will play or lay out alongside the waves of the ocean.

items.name: Main Street Huntington Beach
items.description: Along Main Street, there are a lot of people crowding the streets to find different items from all the shops and restaraunts.

items.name: Huntington Dog Beach
items.description: This beach specifically is an attraction for dog owners because it is one of the only beaches close that allows dogs to go on the beach.

items.name: Huntington Central Park
items.description: This beautiful park is full of greenery where most locals will enjoy picnics, take walks, or ride bikes.

items.name: Huntington Beach Library
items.description: Those who love reading and studying will often go to this nearby library.

items.name: Huntington Beach Bonfires
items.address: 21601 Pacific Coast Highway, Huntington Beach, CA 92646
items.description: It is a common thing for most people to stay out even until dark on the beach to enjoy having bonfires.
